name: Event Detection using Acoustic Sensor
description:
A monitoring device that utilize microphone as the main sensor. The microphone is recording the sound around it, the do the feature extraction
into the spectrogram form. In the spectrogram form, a Convolutional Neural Network were utilized to able recognize the recorded event.
MySQL were used as the database to record the user attendance data, and laravel were used as the backend server. As the user interface, an
android application was built.
